TopicTitle: Window snapped smaller after applying setting change

Articles.Content:
Playing on Mac, KSP v.1.1.3

Tried to adjust my re-entry heating setting and when I clicked apply the game window got smaller, cutting off most mechjeb interface.

Mods Installed:

Atomic Age, Surface Experiment Pack, SpaceY Lifters, Kerbal Engineer Redux, MechJeb, and KSPI Extended

I checked my settings.cfg and my resolution is set at 1024,768

I've restarted the game and my laptop nothing has helped, used command + F to put in fullscreen but it just stretches the visible window.

My games half broken, makes me so sad, pleez help
